Privacy Policy

1. Privacy at a Glance

General Information

The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data that can personally identify you. For detailed information on data protection, please refer to our privacy policy listed below this text.

Data Collection on This Website

Who is Responsible for Data Collection on This Website?

Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the “Notice Concerning the Responsible Party” section of this privacy policy.

Liability for Content

As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with ¬ß 7 para. 1 TMG (German Telemedia Act) under general laws. However, according to ¬ß¬ß 8 to 10 TMG, we as a service provider are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
